DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the relative bioequivalence of oxymorphone hydrochloride extended release tablets (Sandoz) with Opana extended release oxymorphone hydrochloride tablets.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability of Oxymorphone Hydrochloride 40 mg Extended Release Tablets Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on physical exam, nonmedical history or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C Treatment for drug or alcohol abuse Allergy to opiates
